mean_cn: adj.民主的，民主政体的，民主党的
mean_en: (of a country, state, system, etc.) controlled by representatives who are elected by the people of a country; connected with this system; based on the principle that all members of society are equal rather than divided by money or social class; connected with the Democratic Party in the US
sentence: In a democratic society, everyone has the right to vote.
sentence_trans: 在一个民主的国家，人民有权投票选举。
word_etyma: demo人民 + cr + atic…的 → 民主的，民主主义的；民主政体的
